mapper.select: SELECT c.rid, c.org_code orgcode, DATE_FORMAT( a.result_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) bgrq, b.adjustsampletester_code adjustcode, b.adjustsampletester_name adjustname, c.machine_no machineno, c.item_name machinename, d.type, c.result, f.dict_name unit, c.range_value normalrange, c.upvalue normalup, c.downvalue normaldown, a.iscritical , c.item_code printcode, a.patient_type patienttype, a.inhosno, b.in_id regid, b.exe_csqn applyid, e.range_value crisisscope, e.up_value crisisup, e.down_value crisisdown, c.flag FROM lis_test_reg a LEFT JOIN lis_test_reg_his_item_detail b ON a.org_code = b.org_code AND a.reg_id = b.reg_id AND b.exe_csqn IS NOT NULL AND b.exe_csqn <> '' LEFT JOIN lis_result c ON a.org_code = c.org_code AND a.reg_id = c.reg_id AND a.machine_code = c.machine_code AND a.test_form_no = c.test_form_no LEFT JOIN lis_item d ON c.org_code = d.org_code AND c.machine_no = d.machine_item_code AND c.machine_code = d.machine_code left join lis_result_warning e on e.org_code=a.org_code and e.reg_id=a.reg_id AND a.machine_code = e.machine_code AND a.test_form_no =e.test_form_no left join lis_dictionary_detail f on f.type_code = 'LIS_ITEM_UNIT' and f.dict_code=c.unit WHERE a.is_adjustSample = '1' AND a.org_code = 'H37068300546' AND a.result_date >= str_to_date( '2023-12-07 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND a.result_date <= str_to_date( '2023-12-08 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %T' )
